text: Jacques Rouffio (14 August 1928 - 8 July 2016) was a French movie director and screenwriter. His 1986 movie My Brother-in-law Killed My Sister was entered into the 36th Berlin International Film Festival. Rouddio died on 8 July 2016 in Paris, aged 87.Décès du réalisateur Jacques Rouffio ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:French movie directors Category:French screenwriters
